cpl.readme:
\define icn(icon) \end A button (<>) for the Editor toolbar that applies a 'pretty link' to the selected text 'abc' (`[[link|abc]]`)
Assigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/prettylink}}
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tg/prettylink-button
